title: Card Freeze Policy
contentText: Cards can be frozen to prevent unauthorized transactions. Full KYC customers: immediate freeze. Basic KYC customers: OTP verification required. Frozen cards cannot be used for any transactions until unfrozen through proper identity verification.

title: Dispute Creation Policy
contentText: Disputes must be filed within 120 days of transaction date. Required information: transaction ID, reason code, supporting evidence. Agent role can create disputes up to ₹50,000. Lead role required for disputes above ₹50,000.

title: OTP Verification Policy
contentText: OTP verification is required for: basic KYC customers performing sensitive actions, transactions above ₹25,000, card freeze/unfreeze operations. OTP valid for 10 minutes. Maximum 3 attempts allowed.
